org.streaminer.stream.cardinality

Class LinearCounting

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.cardinality.LinearCounting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICardinality

    public class LinearCounting
extends Object
implements ICardinality
    See A Linear-Time Probabilistic Counting Algorithm for Database Applications by Whang, Vander-Zanden, Taylor

      • merge

        public ICardinality merge(ICardinality... estimators)
                   throws LinearCounting.LinearCountingMergeException
        Description copied from interface: ICardinality
        Merges estimators to produce a new estimator for the combined streams of this estimator and those passed as arguments. Nor this estimator nor the one passed as parameters are modified.
        Specified by:
        merge in interface ICardinality
        Parameters:
        estimators - Zero or more compatible estimators
        Returns:
        this if estimators is null or no arguments are passed
        Throws:
        LinearCounting.LinearCountingMergeException - if estimators are not mergeable (all estimators must be instances of LinearCounting of the same size)

      • mergeEstimators

        public static LinearCounting mergeEstimators(LinearCounting... estimators)
                                      throws LinearCounting.LinearCountingMergeException
        Merges estimators to produce an estimator for their combined streams
        Parameters:
        estimators -
        Returns:
        merged estimator or null if no estimators were provided
        Throws:
        LinearCounting.LinearCountingMergeException - if estimators are not mergeable (all estimators must be the same size)
